foreignData.name: Grauen
foreignData.text:
Verursacht Furcht
Immer wenn eine Kreatur dir Schaden zufügt, zerstöre sie.
Wenn das Grauen von egal woher in einen Friedhof gelegt würde, mische es in die Bibliothek seines Besitzers.

foreignData.name: Pavor
foreignData.text:
Inspirar temor.
Siempre que una criatura te haga daño, destrúyela.
Cuando el Pavor vaya a un cementerio desde cualquier parte, barájalo en la biblioteca de su propietario.

foreignData.name: Effroi
foreignData.text:
Peur
À chaque fois qu'une créature vous inflige des blessures, détruisez-la.
Quand l'Effroi est mis dans un cimetière d'où qu'il vienne, mélangez-le dans la bibliothèque de son propriétaire.

foreignData.name: Timore
foreignData.text:
Paura
Ogniqualvolta una creatura ti infligge danno, distruggila.
Quando il Timore viene messo in un cimitero da qualsiasi zona, rimescolalo nel grimorio del suo proprietario.

foreignData.name: 戦慄
foreignData.text:
畏怖
いずれかのクリーチャーがあなたにダメージを与えるたび、それを破壊する。
戦慄がいずれかの領域からいずれかの墓地に置かれたとき、それをオーナーのライブラリーに加えて切り直す。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — エレメンタル・インカーネーション

foreignData.name: Temor
foreignData.text:
Amedrontar
Toda vez que uma criatura causar dano a você, destrua-a.
Quando Temor é colocada num cemitério vinda de qualquer lugar, embaralhe-a no grimório de seu dono.

foreignData.name: Жуть
foreignData.text:
Страх
Каждый раз, когда существо наносит вам повреждения, уничтожьте его.
Когда Жуть попадает откуда-либо на кладбище, втасуйте ее в библиотеку ее владельца.

foreignData.name: 颤栗
foreignData.text:
恐惧
每当任一生物对你造成伤害时，将其消灭。
当颤栗从任何地方置入坟墓场时，将它洗入其拥有者的牌库。

name: Dread
originalText:
Fear
Whenever a creature deals damage to you, destroy it.
When Dread is put into a graveyard from anywhere, shuffle it into its owner's library.

rulings.text: The last ability triggers when the Incarnation is put into its owner’s graveyard from any zone, not just from on the battlefield.

Although this ability triggers when the Incarnation is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, it doesn’t *specifically* trigger on leaving the battlefield, so it doesn’t behave like other leaves-the-battlefield abilities. The ability will trigger from the graveyard.

If the Incarnation had lost this ability while on the battlefield (due to Lignify, for example) and then was destroyed, the ability would still trigger and it would get shuffled into its owner’s library. However, if the Incarnation lost this ability when it was put into the graveyard (due to Yixlid Jailer, for example), the ability wouldn’t trigger and the Incarnation would remain in the graveyard.

If the Incarnation is removed from the graveyard after the ability triggers but before it resolves, it will remain in its new zone when its owner shuffles their library. Similarly, if a replacement effect has the Incarnation move to a different zone instead of being put into the graveyard, the ability won’t trigger at all.

text:
Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
Whenever a creature deals damage to you, destroy it.
When Dread is put into a graveyard from anywhere, shuffle it into its owner's library.
